title: Big Hole National Battlefield: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News         Nez Perce drummers, riders and elders gather for the Aug 2014 commemoration near the 1877 Nez Perce Camp NPS Photo  The annual commemoration of the Battle of the Big Hole will be Saturday, August 8, 2015. The event will start around 10 am and can last up to three hours.
